text.div:
This code system http://ibm.com/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/attribution-source defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
client-emr Client EMRPractitioner attribution recorded in a client's PMS or EMR system
enrollment EnrollmentPractitioner provided on the eligibility record
imputed ImputedPractitioner attribution derived from attribution models

name: AttributionSourceCodeSystem
title: Attribution Source Codes
description: Sources of attribution used to associate a patient to a practitioner

concept.definition: Practitioner attribution recorded in a client's PMS or EMR system
Practitioner provided on the eligibility record
Practitioner attribution derived from attribution models
